outputs.name: data
outputs.description:
A list of honeybee objects that have been re-serialized from
the input file.

inputs.name: _data_file
inputs.description:
A file path to a CSV, JSON or PKL file from which data collections
will be loaded.

inputs.name: _load
inputs.description: Set to "True" to load the data collections from the _data_file.

name: LB Load Data
description:
Load Ladybug data collections from a CSV, JSON, or PKL file.
-
